Name: Linear Programming
Description: Optimize linear objective function subject to linear constraints

Name: Integer Programming
Description: Optimize objective function with integer variables

Name: Dynamic Programming
Description: Break down complex problems into smaller subproblems

Name: Quadratic Programming
Description: Optimize quadratic objective function subject to linear constraints

Name: Mixed-Integer Linear Programming
Description: Optimize linear objective function with integer and continuous variables

Name: Mixed-Integer Nonlinear Programming
Description: Optimize nonlinear objective function with integer and continuous variables

Name: Semi-definite Programming
Description: Optimize linear objective function subject to matrix constraints

Name: Robust Optimization
Description: Optimize under uncertainty with guaranteed performance
Example: Supply chain optimization under demand uncertainty

Name: Metaheuristics
Description: Use high-level algorithms to guide optimization
Example: Optimize complex problems with simulated annealing
